definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Injecting drug in a short period would be more effective if MEC is relatively high.
sentences.chinese: MEC较大时，比较适合采用短时间集中注射方式。

sentences.english: The fibers have obviously effect of magnetizing in several minute.
sentences.chinese: 磁性纤维用很短时间的充磁就可以获得较理想的效果。

sentences.english: Then it would seem that the disciples went back to their fishing for a short period.
sentences.chinese: 之后，门徒似乎有一段短时间回去作捕鱼的老本行。

sentences.english: Short time traders shouldn't miss this book.
sentences.chinese: 短时间商不应该错过这本书。

sentences.english: Recall that the search engine crawls a large set of pages in a small timeframe.
sentences.chinese: 回想到搜索引擎在短时间内抓取大量的页面。

sentences.english: They chummed up in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 他们在很短时间内就成为好朋友了。

sentences.english: You could have a separate short-running process, such as place order.
sentences.chinese: 您可以设置一个独立的短时间运行的流程，如下订单。

sentences.english: Everyone knows everything burns up in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 人人都知道任何东西都会在短时间内烧完。

sentences.english: That income stream has been eviscerated – and is not returning soon.
sentences.chinese: 这种收入流模式已经被废除，短时间内无法恢复。

sentences.english: A shot to the head deals bonus damage and stuns for a short duration.
sentences.chinese: 一枪爆头造成额外的伤害，并造成极短时间的晕眩。

sentences.english: Realizing the significance of this dharma you will be freed of defilements in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 了解了这正法的意义，你将在短时间内解脱于烦恼。

sentences.english: In the short time that the computers were close, they could transfer encrypted files between each other.
sentences.chinese: 在电脑关着的短时间里，他们会互传加密的文件。

sentences.english: Still, others questioned the feasibility of conducting DNA sequencing and typing within a short amount of time.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有人提出在短时间内可进行DNA测序和分型。

sentences.english: We're going to be submitting -- as soon as our secretary's approved, almost simultaneously, shortly thereafter, a plan.
sentences.chinese: 只要一批准，短时间内，我们就会递交一份方案。

sentences.english: For simple, and easy to eat, the short time achievement perfect curve, realize the dream.
sentences.chinese: 而易举，食用简单，短时间成就完美曲线，实现梦想。

sentences.english: This meant the change between hypnotic state and normal state could be varied in seconds.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着催眠状态和非催眠状态在短时间内就能转换。

definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
